title: Dennis Quaid engaged to Laura Savoie and Meredith Blake throws shade
text:
Dennis is engaged to phD student Laura (Picture: Getty)

Dennis Quaid has popped the question to his girlfriend – who is 39 years younger than him.

The 65-year-old actor has confirmed he is engaged to 26-year-old Laura Savoie, after a romantic proposal in Hawaii.

The Day After Tomorrow star told Extra: ‘It happened on the very northernmost point of Oahu, at Turtle Bay. It was kind of spontaneous. It was very much a surprise.

‘I had the ring in my pocket… It has been kind of a month-and-a-half plan… I wanted it to be private.

We’re getting major Parent Trap flashbacks (Picture: Disney)

‘She was actually taking a selfie of us, and I put the ring in front and said, “Will you marry me?” — and then she fell down.’

Dennis was first pictured with University of Texas PhD student Laura in May this year, after he split from his girlfriend of three years Santa Auzina.

Advertisement

Unsurprisingly, the age gap has attracted a lot of criticism, seeing as Dennis was nearly 40 when Laura was born, and even his The Parent Trap co-star Elaine Hendrix has thrown shade.

Well, seeing as Elaine played his character Nick’s 26-year-old fiancee Meredith Blake, with his daughter, played by Lindsay Lohan, saying: ‘You’re going to adopt Meredith’ and ‘How can you marry a woman young enough to be my big sister?’… it’s all a bit too on the nose.

Elaine, now 48, quote-tweeted an article about Dennis’s engagement and added: ‘Watch out for those twins.’

Phenomenal.

Dennis – also known for his roles in Great Balls of Fire!, The Big Easy and Far From Heaven- has already been married three times.

Dennis was previously married to Meg Ryan (Photo by Kevin Mazur/WireImage)

Dennis and Kimberly’s divorce was finalised last year (Picture: Jeff Kravitz/FilmMagic)

He was married to actress PJ Soles from 1978 until 1983, and he famously married Meg Ryan in 1991.

The couple had a son, Jack, in 1992 before they announced their separation in 2000 and divorced the following year.

After dating model Shanna Moakler for eight months in 2001, Quaid began dating real estate agent Kimberly Buffington and they married in 2004, welcoming twins Thomas Boone and Zoe Grace via surrogate in 2007.

Kimberly and Dennis split several times over the next few years, with both parties filing for divorce on separate occasions, but in 2016, they split for good, with their divorce being finalised last April.

Meanwhile, Laura was previously dating Entourage star Jeremy Piven.
